title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
EB:
1. The marking between button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. 
2. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. 
3. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item. 
4. The signature preview must be a label that wraps text. 
5. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 
2. Change a parameter name to something very long. 
3. Observe that the preview is cut off.
